description: SEOUL, South Korea—South Korea’s privacy watchdog on Tuesday fined social media company Meta 21.6 billion won ($15 million) for illegally collecting sensitive personal information from Facebook users, including data about their political views and sexual orientation, and sharing it with thousands of advertisers. It was the latest in a series of penalties against Meta by […]
title: South Korea Fines Meta $15 Million for Illegally Collecting Information on Facebook Users

description: Blocked users can now view posts but are restricted in other ways from interacting.
title: X Makes Change to Its Block Function
